title: OCR, monetary looking fonts
content:
Does anybody recognize these two fonts? I don't know their origin, as the images were passed on to me. It looks like it was scanned from a bill or check of some sort.

They could be custom. What do you think?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019111453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font%20Sample1_3631.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019111453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font%20Sample%202_5466.jpg)
author: weinziet

comments.content:
Banknote typefaces are generally custom, (in an effort to make forgery more difficult).

Nick Cooke
Yeah I thought so. I'll pass on that info. Thanks for the reply.
